snippet: Arkansas has taken a first step toward celebrating Martin Luther King Jr. on the third Monday in January and honoring Robert E. Lee in the fall rather than the current practice of recognizing both men on the same day in January....

headline.main: 2 Charged With Trying to Bring Loaded Guns Onto Planes
headline.print_headline: 2 Charged With Trying to Bring Loaded Guns Onto Planes

lead_paragraph: Arkansas has taken a first step toward celebrating Martin Luther King Jr. on the third Monday in January and honoring Robert E. Lee in the fall rather than the current practice of recognizing both men on the same day in January.
